TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataGridPagerStyle extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle
Public NotInheritable Class DataGridPagerStyle Inherits TableItemStyle

summary.span: 为 控件的页导航提供样式。

span.span: Specifies the style for the pager of the control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 页导航是控件上的一个元素，可用于在 启用分页时链接到其他页。The pager is an element on the control that allows you to link to other pages when paging is enabled. 控件的属性 使用此类的实例来表示页导航的样式属性。The property of the control uses an instance of this class to represent the style properties for the pager. 有关分页的详细信息，请参阅 和 。For more information on paging, see and . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 对象来表示属性中的页导航元素的样式 。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to represent the style of the pager element in the property. 对象设置分页元素的显示模式和对齐方式。The object sets the display mode and alignment of the paging element. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridPagerStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridPagerStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 将指定的 对象的样式复制到 类的此实例中。

span.span: Copies the style of the specified object into this instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可将指定对象的样式属性复制 到该类的此实例中 。Use the method to copy the style properties of the specified object into this instance of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法将 对象的属性复制 到 对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to copy the properties of a object to a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.CopyFrom Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.CopyFrom Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.CopyFrom Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.CopyFrom Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void MergeWith(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style s) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub MergeWith (s As Style)

span.span: The to merge with.

summary.span: 将指定的 对象的样式与 类的此实例合并在一起。

span.span: Merges the style of the specified object with this instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可将指定对象的样式属性 与类的此实例组合在一起 。Use the method to combine the style properties of the specified object with this instance of the class. 如果此实例的属性已设置为值，则该属性将保持不变。If a property from this instance is already set to a value, the property is unchanged. 如果未设置属性，则此方法使用对象的相应属性中的值设置该属性 。If a property is not set, this method sets that property with the value from the corresponding property of the object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法将 对象的属性与对象组合在 一起 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to combine the properties of a object with a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.MergeWith Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.MergeWith Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.MergeWith Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.MergeWith Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::PagerMode Mode { System::Web::UI::WebControls::PagerMode get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::PagerMode value); };
member this.Mode : System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerMode with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定页导航元素是显示链接到下一页和前一页的按钮，还是显示直接与某一页链接的数值按钮。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the pager element displays buttons that link to the next and previous page, or numeric buttons that link directly to a page.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定要在控件上使用的一组页导航按钮 。Use the property to specify which set of pager buttons to use on the control. 可以指定链接到下一页和上一页的按钮，或指定直接链接到页面的数字按钮。You can specify buttons that link to the next and previous page, or numeric buttons that link directly to a page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来指定页导航元素显示为链接到下一页和上一页的按钮。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the pager element is displayed as buttons that link to the next and previous page. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.Mode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.Mode Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.Mode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.Mode Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的值不是 值之一。

span.span: The specified value is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ NextPageText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.NextPageText : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置为下一页按钮显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text displayed for the next page button.

value.span: 为下一页按钮显示的文本。

span.span: The text to display for the next page button.

value.span: 默认值为 ，它呈现为大于号 >) (。

span.span: The default value is , which is rendered as the greater than sign (>).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性为 "下一页" 按钮提供自定义文本。Use the property to provide custom text for the next page button. 若要使 `PagerMode.NextPrev` 此属性生效，必须将属性设置为。The property must be set to `PagerMode.NextPrev` for this property to have any effect. 此属性与属性一起使用 ，以便为控件上的页导航的 "下一页" 和 "上一页" 按钮创建一组自定义控件 。This property is used along with the property to create a custom set of controls for the next and previous buttons of the pager on the control. > [!NOTE] > 此属性不会自动将特殊字符编码为 HTML。This property does not automatically encode special characters to HTML. 需要将这些字符转换为相应的 HTML 值。You need to convert these characters to the appropriate HTML value. 例如，大于号 ( # A0) 不会自动转换为 `>` 。For example the greater than sign (>) will not automatically convert to `>`. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性为 page 元素的下一页导航按钮指定自定义文本。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify custom text for the next page navigation button of the pager element. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.NextPageText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.NextPageText Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.NextPageText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.NextPageText Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The specified value is less than .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int PageButtonCount { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.PageButtonCount : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置在 控件的页导航元素中同时显示的数值按钮的数目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of numeric buttons to display concurrently in the pager element of the control.

value.span: 在 控件的页导航元素中同时显示的数值按钮的数目。

span.span: The number of numeric buttons to display concurrently in the pager element of the control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定要在控件的页导航元素中同时显示的数值按钮的数目 。Use the property to specify the number of numeric buttons to display concurrently in the pager element of the control. 若要使 `PagerMode.NumericPages` 此属性生效，必须将属性设置为。The property must be set to `PagerMode.NumericPages` for this property to have any effect. 如果控件中的页 多于此属性中指定的页，则在页导航元素中显示省略号按钮 ( ) 。If there are more pages in the control than specified in this property, ellipsis buttons (...) are displayed in the pager element. 当单击这些按钮时，将显示下一组或前一组数字按钮。When clicked, these buttons display the next or previous set of numeric buttons. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性在控件的页导航元素中同时显示五个数值页按钮 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display five numeric page buttons concurrently in the pager element of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.PageButtonCount Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.PageButtonCount Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.PageButtonCount Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.PageButtonCount Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The selected value is less than .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::PagerPosition Position { System::Web::UI::WebControls::PagerPosition get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::PagerPosition value); };
member this.Position : System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerPosition with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中页导航元素的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the position of the pager element in the control.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定页导航元素在控件中的显示位置 。Use the property to specify the location where the pager element is displayed in the control. 页导航元素可以显示在控件的上边缘、下边缘或同时显示在控件的上边缘和下边缘 。The pager element can be displayed at the upper edge, the lower edge, or at both the upper and lower edges of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来指定在控件的上边缘显示页导航 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the pager is displayed at the upper edge of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.Position Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.Position Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.Position Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.Position Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的值不是 值之一。

span.span: The specified value is not one of the values.

span.span: Gets or sets the text displayed for the previous page button.

value.span: 为前一页按钮显示的文本。

span.span: The text to display for the previous page button.

value.span: 默认值为 ，它呈现为小于号 <) (。

span.span: The default value is , which is rendered as the less than sign (<).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性为 "下一页" 按钮提供自定义文本。Use the property to provide custom text for the next page button. 若要使 `PagerMode.NextPrev` 此属性生效，必须将属性设置为。The property must be set to `PagerMode.NextPrev` for this property to have any effect. 此属性与属性一起使用 ，以创建控件上页导航的 "下一页" 和 "上一页" 按钮的自定义外观 。This property is used along with the property to create a custom appearance for the next and previous buttons of the pager on the control. > [!NOTE] > 此属性不会自动将特殊字符编码为 HTML。This property does not automatically encode special characters to HTML. 需要将特殊字符转换为相应的 HTML 值。You need to convert special characters to the appropriate HTML value. 例如，大于号 ( # A0) 不会自动转换为 `>` 。For example, the greater than sign (>) will not automatically convert to `>`. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性为 page 元素的上一页导航按钮指定自定义文本。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify custom text for the previous page navigation button of the pager element. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.NextPageText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.NextPageText Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.NextPageText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.NextPageText Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

The default value is .
